page.title: 12FARMING DAIRY.
page.content: {CHANNEL FARM.}This is a dairy farm which concentrates on producing dairy products of a high quality for local use. The cream is delivered by van to shops and there is a shop at the farm where the public can buy fresh farm made produce like ice cream, cream cheese, goats cheese and eggs. {DEVONSHIRE CLOTTED CREAM. } This is usually only made in thesouth West of England mainly in Devon but now in Cornwall. It is very popular with holiday makers and Devonians usually prefer it to any other cream with fruit etc and call it "real cream". It is a cooked cream made by allowing the milk to stand in a special bowl and then heating it slowly. When it is cold the cream is skimmed off and is thick. It has a very high fat content but is delicious with freshly cooked scones and strawberry jam or friut.
